Drawing_Number.description: A unique identifier assigned to the drawing.

Name.description: The title or name of the drawing.

Revision_History.description: A list of JSON objects representing the revision history of the drawing.

Raw_Material.description: The raw material referenced in the drawing - typically located in a table with a prefix 'MASS:'.

Bill_of_Materials.description: A list of JSON objects representing the Bill of Materials for the drawing.
